header.title: phpBB Garage 2.0.0
header.description: This mod allows users of your forum to add details about their vehicles.
header.author-notes: - This Mod Was Inspired By IPB Based Garage By Matthew C. Veno

action-group.diy-instructions: Create directory ./garage Create directory ./garage/upload Chmod ./garage/ to 755 Chmod ./garage/upload to 777 Open your web browser and run install_garage.php Delete install_garage.php if it ran succesfully

edit.find: 'SELECT' => 'u.user_id, u.group_id as default_group, u.username, u.user_colour, u.user_rank, u.user_posts, u.user_allow_pm, g.group_id, g.group_name, g.group_colour, g.group_type, ug.user_id as ug_user_id',

inline-edit.inline-action: , g.id as garage_id, CONCAT_WS(' ', g.made_year, makes.make, models.model) AS vehicle

edit.action: ,array( 'FROM' => array(GARAGE_TABLE => 'g'), 'ON' => 'g.user_id = p.poster_id and g.main_vehicle = 1' ) ,array( 'FROM' => array(GARAGE_MAKES_TABLE => 'makes'), 'ON' => 'g.make_id = makes.id and makes.pending = 0' ) ,array( 'FROM' => array(GARAGE_MODELS_TABLE => 'models'), 'ON' => 'g.model_id = models.id and models.pending = 0' )

//-- mod start : Garage ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- //-- add 'IMG_CAT_GARAGE' => 'phpBB Garage images', 'IMG_GARAGE_VEHICLE_IMG_ATTACHED'=> 'Vehicle with image', 'IMG_GARAGE_SLIP_IMG_ATTACHED' => 'Slip with image', 'IMG_GARAGE_ICON_GARAGE' => 'Garage icon', 'IMG_GARAGE_MAIN_MENU' => 'Index menu', 'IMG_GARAGE_BROWSE' => 'Browse menu', 'IMG_GARAGE_SEARCH' => 'Search menu', 'IMG_GARAGE_QUARTERMILE_TABLE' => 'Quartermile table', 'IMG_GARAGE_DYNORUN_TABLE' => 'Dynorun table', 'IMG_GARAGE_GARAGE_REVIEW' => 'Garage review', 'IMG_GARAGE_SHOP_REVIEW' => 'Shop review', 'IMG_GARAGE_INSURANCE_REVIEW' => 'Insurance review', 'IMG_GARAGE_CREATE_VEHICLE' => 'Create vehicle', 'IMG_GARAGE_EDIT_VEHICLE' => 'Edit vehicle', 'IMG_GARAGE_DELETE_VEHICLE' => 'Delete vehicle', 'IMG_GARAGE_VIEW_VEHICLE' => 'View vehicle', 'IMG_GARAGE_ADD_MODIFICATION' => 'Add modification', 'IMG_GARAGE_ADD_INSURANCE' => 'Add insurance', 'IMG_GARAGE_ADD_DYNORUN' => 'Add dynorun', 'IMG_GARAGE_ADD_QUARTERMILE' => 'Add quartermile', 'IMG_GARAGE_MANAGE_GALLERY' => 'Manage vehicle gallery', 'IMG_GARAGE_EDIT' => 'Edit', 'IMG_GARAGE_DELETE' => 'Delete', 'IMG_GARAGE_MAIN_VEHICLE' => 'Main vehicle', 'IMG_GARAGE_NO_THUMB' => 'No thumb', 'IMG_GARAGE_SHOW_DETAILS' => 'Show details', 'IMG_GARAGE_HIDE_DETAILS' => 'Hide details', 'IMG_GARAGE_MOVE_UP' => 'Move up', 'IMG_GARAGE_MOVE_DOWN' => 'Move down', 'IMG_GARAGE_SET_APPROVED' => 'Approve', 'IMG_GARAGE_SET_PENDING' => 'Pending', //-- mod finish : Garage ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
